title: Golden Poison Frog
desc:
Post 3121
Attack - Unstoppable
Defense - None
- The Golden Poison Frog is considered one of the most poisonous animals in the world. It may select a player to poison, as well as those who encounter it through visiting.
Attributes -
- The destruction to the habitat of Frogs makes it impossible for multiple poisonous Frogs to coexist.
- The Golden Poison Frog, like other poisonous frogs, is unable to perform the Frog kill, until it remains as the only living Frog.
- The Frog kill may not occur when the Variable Poison Dart Frog is poisoning a player.
- The Golden Poison Frog is unable to directly produce its own toxins. As such, it can only do so after the Frogs have killed two players for each time it wants to poison another.
Goal - Keep your habitat from being destroyed and kill those who want to destroy it.
